learningAssessment.title: Ingredient quality
learningAssessment.shortdesc: Note that with an “all of the above” type answer, use the lcSingleSelect2 interaction type, rather than lcMultipleSelect2. If you use the lcMultipleSelect2 and a student selects all correct answers (with or without the “all of the above” selection), most learning management systems (LMS) will mark this as an incorrect response.
